Pre-Game Insights: The stands, barring the premium ones, were packed to the rafters for their Group D game against South Africa.
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzim Sakib acknowledged the incredible support for their team during their T20 World Cup 2024 match against South Africa in New York.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Close to 25,000 people were at the venue to watch the crunch match
The Bangladesh fans dominated the crowd at the 34,000-seater Nassau County Cricket Ground, accounting for the second-biggest crowd at the venue.
